resources.string:
The manager is not yet loaded in the launcher or couldn't be found.

Please click one of the Buttons below.
There are three ways to load the manager script:
•The Launcher method requires most clicks.
•The Template method requires to restart the launcher.
•The Root method requires root access.

Choose one

-Click the button
-Click 'Scripts…'
-Click 'Load a script…'
-Choose This app

-Click the button
-Merge the upcoming template into your setup.
-Do not import the wallpaper.
-Please be aware that the launcher restarts in the process.
Code should be here. Please contact the developer
This page is not related to the repository. Do you want to open it with your normal browser?
Script manager loaded correctly. Now navigate to a script\'s page and click the Import button when available
There was an error trying to pass the data to the manager
Found more than one Script on this page, please choose one
No script found. If you know that there is one, contact the developer
Something went wrong. If you see this message for the first time, try again. Otherwise load the Repository Importer from LL menu
Action failed. Maybe your device isn\'t rooted. If you know that your device is rooted and you see this message for the first time, please retry. Otherwise load with another method
